newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Goldminco says to buy mine tenements.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Goldminco says to buy mine tenements.

text.p: Mine exploration company Goldminco NL said on Tuesday it will acquire 100 percent of four exploration licenses in the Curnamona Craton, located about 100 kilometres north west of the town of Broken Hill.
Goldminco said it would pay Malanti Pty Ltd, a company controlled by two directors of Goldminco, A$7,460 for the tenements, ELA 410/96, 411/96, 412/96 and 413/96.
One license area abuts a region where the Broken Hill Pty Co Ltd is earning a 70 percent interest from Lynch Mining Pty Ltd by spending A$1.3 million on exploration, the company said
It also is located about 10 km north of the Benagerie Ridge Joint Venture between Pasminco Ltd and Lynch, Goldminco noted.
Golminco said it considered the license areas in the Curnamona Craton highly prospective for lead, zinc and silver deposits and copper/gold deposits.
